mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_cmt (iboard, iuser, cmt) VALUES (#{iboard}, #{iuser}, #{cmt});
mapper.select: /* mapper보고 list로 뽑아주니까 list를 따로 안적어준다. */ SELECT A.icmt, A.iuser, A.cmt, A.regdate, B.unm AS writerNm, B.profileImg FROM t_board_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard} ORDER BY A.icmt
